summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting underground and surface rights electrical distribution easements over portions of King County Short Plat 1282021; King County Short Plat 864089; Lot 3, Block 5, Churchill's Suburban Villa One Acre Tracts; Irvington on the Sound; Lots 9 & 10, all in Block 4, Crown Addition; etc., and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
